snippet.title: Hope Lake Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: https://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/hope-lake.html

The Hope Lake Boarding School was abandoned long ago when one of its teachers drowned by accident and the school was closed. Now all of the girls who attended Hope Lake have gone missing. Who's taking these girls and was the teacher's death really an accident? As a detective, you must investigate the strange events which took place on the shore of the lake and within the walls of the boarding school. Visit the abandoned and ill-boding boarding school to uncover the truth.
